fingerprint.pattern: ^(?:#HY000)?Host '[^']+' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server$
fingerprint.example: Host '10.10.10.10' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server
#HY000Host '10.10.10.10' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Host not allowed to connect (English)

fingerprint.pattern: ^(?:#HY000)?Host '[^']+' is blocked because of many connection errors.\s{1,2}[Uu]nblock with 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'$
fingerprint.example: Host '10.10.10.10' is blocked because of many connection errors; unblock with 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
Host '10.10.10.10' is blocked because of many connection errors. Unblock with 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Blocked, too many errors from this host

fingerprint.pattern: ^Host '[^']+' is not allowed to connect to this MariaDB server$
fingerprint.example: Host '10.10.10.10' is not allowed to connect to this MariaDB server
fingerprint.description: MariaDB MariaDB - Error: Host not allowed to connect (English)

fingerprint.pattern: ^Le hôte '[^']+' n'est pas authorisé à se connecter à ce serveur MySQL$
fingerprint.example: Le hôte '10.10.10.10' n'est pas authorisé à se connecter à ce serveur MySQL
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Host not allowed to connect (French)

fingerprint.pattern: ^'Host' '[^']+' não tem permissão para se conectar com este servidor MySQL$
fingerprint.example: 'Host' '10.10.10.10' não tem permissão para se conectar com este servidor MySQL
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Host not allowed to connect (Portuguese)

fingerprint.example: Host '10.10.10.10' hat keine Berechtigung, sich mit diesem MySQL-Server zu verbinden
Host hat keine Berechtigung, eine Verbindung zu diesem MySQL Server herzustellen.
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Host not allowed to connect (German)

fingerprint.pattern: ^Host.+?blockiert wegen zu vieler Verbindungsfehler. Aufheben der Blockierung mit 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
fingerprint.example: Host blockiert wegen zu vieler Verbindungsfehler. Aufheben der Blockierung mit 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'.
Host '10.10.10.10' blockiert wegen zu vieler Verbindungsfehler. Aufheben der Blockierung mit 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Blocked, too many errors from this host (German)

fingerprint.pattern: ^L'h.+?est bloqu.+?cause d'un trop grand nombre d'erreur de connexion\..+?bloquer le par 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
fingerprint.example: L'h�te '10.10.10.10' est bloqu� � cause d'un trop grand nombre d'erreur de connexion. D�bloquer le par 'mysqladmin flush-hosts'
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Blocked, too many errors from this host (French)

fingerprint.example: Can't create a new thread (errno -1); if you are not out of available memory, you can consult the manual for a possible OS-dependent bug
Can't create a new thread (errno 12); if you are not out of available memory, you can consult the manual for a possible OS-dependent bug
Can't create a new thread (errno 35); if you are not out of available memory, you can consult the manual for a possible OS-dependent bug
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Out of memory
Oracle MySQL - Error: Out of memory
Oracle MySQL - Error: Too many connections

fingerprint.example: Can't get hostname for your address
fingerprint.description: Oracle MySQL - Error: Unable to resolve client hostname
Oracle MySQL Proxy - Error: Host not allowed to connect
Oracle MySQL Proxy - Error: Backends down
